short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: With the ShopBack Button, earning Cashback and discovering the best deals is going to be a breeze.
short.de: Mit dem ShopBack Button wird das Verdienen von Cashback und das Entdecken der besten Deals zum Kinderspiel.
short.en_US: With the ShopBack browser extension, earning Cashback and discovering the best deals is going to be a breeze.
short.id: Dengan ShopBack Button, dapatkan Cashback dan temukan penawaran terbaik dengan sangat mudah.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Unleash the power of Cashback when you shop online!

Add ShopBack Extension to your browser in seconds and receive instant notifications when a store has Cashback. Here's what it can do for you:

ğŸ”” Earn Cashback from over 2,000 global stores
Activate ShopBack browser extension with just one click, and receive notifications when Cashback is available while shopping online.

âœ… Know when your Cashback is confirmed
Weâ€™ll notify you when your Cashback is tracked after you check out.

ğŸª„ Find the best Cashback in search results
Discover deals and savings on Googleâ€™s search result pages.

ğŸ‘€ Keep track of the best deals
Add your favourite stores on your watchlist and weâ€™ll notify you when a deal is available, so you donâ€™t miss out!

---------------------------------------------- 

Your privacy matters to us. We never store any credit card or personal identifier data. We will only collect your browsing history and cookies to attribute shopping trips at our partner stores. You can read more about our privacy policy here: https://support.shopback.com/hc/en-us/articles/33321399347475-ShopBack-Privacy-Policy

By using the ShopBack Button extension, you agree to our terms and conditions: https://support.shopback.com/hc/en-us/articles/34370376094867-Install-and-use-ShopBack-browser-extension
long.de:
Mit dem ShopBack Button wird es ein Kinderspiel, Cashback zu verdienen und die besten Deals zu entdecken!
 
Entfesseln Sie die Macht von Cashback, wenn Sie online einkaufen!
 
FÃ¼gen Sie ShopBack Button zu Ihrem Browser hinzu und erhalten Sie sofortige Benachrichtigungen, wenn ein Shop Cashback anbietet. Hier ist, was es fÃ¼r Sie tun kann:
 
Verdienen Sie Cashback bei Ã¼ber 1.000 Partnershops ğŸ”” 
Aktivieren Sie den ShopBack-Button mit nur einem Klick, und lassen Sie sich benachrichtigen, wenn Cashback beim Online-Einkauf verfÃ¼gbar ist.
 
Wissen, wann Ihr Cashback bestÃ¤tigt ist  âœ… 
Machen Sie sich Sorgen, ob Ihr Cashback verfolgt wird? Das muss nicht sein! Wir benachrichtigen Sie, wenn Ihr Cashback verfolgt wird, und bestÃ¤tigen dies, nachdem Sie zur Kasse gegangen sind.
 
Finden Sie das beste Cashback in den Suchergebnissen  ğŸª„ 
Entdecken Sie Cashback-Deals und Einsparungen direkt auf den Suchergebnisseiten von Google.
 
Behalten Sie die besten Deals im Auge  ğŸ‘€ 
FÃ¼gen Sie Ihre Lieblingsshops und -produkte zu Ihrer Merkliste hinzu und wir benachrichtigen Sie, wenn ein Deal verfÃ¼gbar ist, damit Sie ihn nicht verpassen!
 
 ---------------------------------------------- 
 
Ihre PrivatsphÃ¤re ist uns wichtig. Wir speichern niemals Kreditkarten- oder persÃ¶nliche Identifizierungsdaten. Wir sammeln Ihren Browserverlauf und Cookies nur, um EinkÃ¤ufe in unseren Partnershops zuordnen zu kÃ¶nnen. Hier kÃ¶nnen Sie mehr Ã¼ber unsere Datenschutzpolitik lesen: https://support.shopback.de/hc/de/articles/15958168142099-Datenschutzerkl%C3%A4rung
 
 Mit der Nutzung der ShopBack Button-Erweiterung erklÃ¤ren Sie sich mit unseren Bedingungen und Konditionen einverstanden: https://support.shopback.de/hc/de/articles/15958197462163-ABG
long.en_US:
Unleash the power of Cashback when you shop online!

Add ShopBack Button to your browser in seconds and receive instant notifications when a store has Cashback. Here's what it can do for you:

ğŸ”” Earn Cashback on over 2,000 online stores
Activate ShopBack Button with just one click, and receive notifications when Cashback is available while shopping at major online brands!

âœ… Know when your Cashback is confirmed
Worry whether your Cashback is tracked? Don't be! Weâ€™ll notify you when your Cashback is tracked and confirm after you check out.

ğŸ› Discover Cashback offers on Taobao and Shopee
Receive notifications on the best Cashback deals across your favourite Taobao and Shopee stores and products when youâ€™re browsing online.

ğŸª„ Find the best Cashback in search results
Discover Cashback deals and savings right on the search result pages of Google.

âš–ï¸ Compare and get the best prices. 
Leave the heavy-lifting to us! Our price comparison tool helps you find the best prices and deals across different products and stores, so you can save more.

ğŸ‘€ Keep track of the best deals 
Add your favourite stores and products on your watchlist and weâ€™ll notify you when a deal is available, so you donâ€™t miss out!

ğŸ’° Maximise your savings with Vouchers
Want even more savings and deals? We'll notify you when Vouchers and Gift Cards are available while youâ€™re shopping online.

---------------------------------------------- 

Your privacy matters to us. We never store any credit card or personal identifier data. We only collect your browsing history and cookies to attribute shopping trips at our partner stores. You can read more about our privacy policy here: https://support.shopback.sg/hc/en-us/articles/360039652893

By using the ShopBack Button extension, you agree to our terms and conditions: https://support.shopback.sg/hc/en-gb/articles/360046598194-Install-and-use-ShopBack-Button-browser-extension
long.id:
Rasakan kekuatan Cashback saat kamu belanja online!

Tambahkan Tombol ShopBack ke browsermu dalam hitungan detik dan terima notifikasi langsung saat toko favoritmu ada Cashback. Keuntungan Tombol ShopBack:

ğŸ”” Dapatkan Cashback di 300+ toko
Aktifkan Tombol ShopBack hanya dengan satu klik, dan terima notifikasi saat ada Cashback saat kamu belanja online.

âœ… Ketahui kapan Cashback Anda dikonfirmasi
Takut Cashback-mu gak terlacak? Gausah khawatir! Kita akan kasih tahu kamu, saat Cashback kamu terlacak dan mengonfirmasi setelah kamu check out.

ğŸ› Temukan penawaran Cashback di (Taobao)
Terima pemberitahuan tentang penawaran Cashback terbaik di seluruh toko dan produk Taobao favoritmu saat kamu menjelajah online.

ğŸª„ Temukan Cashback terbaik di hasil pencarian
Temukan penawaran Cashback langsung di halaman hasil pencarian Google.

âš–ï¸ Bandingkan dan dapatkan harga terbaik.
Serahkan pekerjaan berat pada kami! Alat perbandingan harga kami membantumu menemukan harga dan penawaran terbaik di berbagai produk dan toko, jadi kamu bisa lebih berhemat.

ğŸ‘€ Melacak penawaran terbaik
Tambahkan toko dan produk favoritmu di daftar pantauanmu dan kami akan memberi tahu saat ada penawaran, jadi jangan lewatkan ya!

ğŸ’° Maksimalkan tabunganmu dengan Voucher
Ingin lebih banyak berhemat dan ingin lebih banyak promo? Kami akan memberi tahumu saat Voucher dan Kartu Hadiah tersedia saat kamu berbelanja online.

-------------------------------------------------

Privasimu penting bagi kami. Kami tidak pernah menyimpan kartu kredit atau data pengenal pribadi apa pun. Kami hanya mengumpulkan riwayat penjelajahan dan cookie-mu untuk mengaitkan perjalanan belanja di toko mitra kami. Kamu bisa membaca lebih lanjut tentang kebijakan privasi kami di sini: https://support.shopback.sg/hc/en-us/articles/360039652893

Dengan menggunakan ekstensi Tombol ShopBack, Kamu menyetujui syarat dan ketentuan kami: https://support.shopback.co.id/hc/id/sections/1500002694462-Tombol-Shopback
